title: What are the cheesiest Blackpink song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Im gonna more go off of most iconic than cheesiest Ddu du ddu du “black to the pink watch it out were pretty savage” “I keep it lit like a matchstick, bitch I’m a star but no Patrick” “got more juice than hi-C” “Real talk imma let the hoes talk when they see the billions better call a banker” Kill this love “Look at me, look at you, who will break into two, your smart thats what you are” “Feeling like a sinner it’s so fire with him I go boohoo” “He said you look crazy thank you baby I owe it all to you” “We all commit to love that makes you cry, we all commit to love that kills you inside. We must kill this love yeah it’s sad but true we must kill this love before it kills you too” as if it’s your last “Can you feel it with every breath just how much I want you near, even when I look at you I’m missing you I’m bad at this won’t you set me free” “Imma fall in love baby, you gon finna catch me, give you all of this baby call me pretty and nasty” “I’ll be the Bonnie and you’ll be my Clyde, we ride or dies, X’s and O’s” Playing with fire “Kiss him will I diss him I don’t know but I miss him” “Now burn baby burn” “So don’t play with me boy” “Don’t stop me, so this love can burn the night away stay “I just want you to stay” “I hate you but I love you” “It goes a little something like” “Sometimes I think it’s just for you that I’m living and breathing” “in a world full of lies my only truth is you” Whistle “Hey boy” “Make em whistle like a missile, bomb bomb” “Got them begging give me some more baby put your lips together make that whistle blow” “Just whistle to my heart” “Smooth criminal I’m bad untouchable” boombayah “Been a bad girl I know I am, and I’m so hot, I need a fan I don’t want a boy I need a man” “Raise your glass to the roof like Chang Chang Chang, hands up, lit with a bottle full henny watch your mouth when you speak my name, Jennie” “middle finger up, F U pay me” “I know you wanna tough” So hot “A little bit of black and a little bit of pink but ain’t none little bout this” “pretty as shhh, don’t gotta say it no more, look at my face and they know they’ve seen it before, oh, made it to vouge” “What we rock they all rock had to stop” “We the only gang to run the game in high heels” forever young “I could die in this moment” “Blackpink is the revelation” “Forever young boy so we ride or die” “Say life’s a bitch but mines a movie” “Let’s ride endlessly, we like to party” “Girls wanna have some fun, we go dumb dumb dumb” “Yeah girls wanna have some fun, we ain’t done done done” really “Better act like you know what” “Eyes have been calling baby, body’s been telling me take me, boys have been saying to date me, your lips should be saying the same thing” “aye, but I don’t play with them fakes keep it real with me” “It’s not complicated it’s actually easy 123” “That playlist my favorite so play it but baby f a love song, I need you to say it, say it.” “I gotta know that your for real, really really really” hope not “For you, I’m okay with being hurt” “I was wrong” “Yeah yeah yeah yeah” See u later “The man that you are ain’t shit” “I’ll throw you away recycle, the girl with you is an idiot” “Hold up, you thought it would last forever, but then in the end again you messed, Playing me back-and-forth like a ping-pong, well now I’m dumping you you dingdong” “Woulda coulda shoulda didn’t” “See you later maybe never” “You ain’t got no best friend” “Your a loser loner, mean bully ha-” “Better remember straight, I’m a boss bitch” “goodbye baby” “Why you wanna go and do that do that why” Don’t know what to do “Don’t know what to do without you” “Wait a minute, can somebody stop the time” “You know I don’t know what to do, don’t know what to do” Kick it “I’ll break your break your heart never ask for much” “I ain’t nothing like the same same girls that you’ve had” “I’ll kick it if your down” “Get kicked rocks the curb yeah kicked out, never kick a girl when she’s kicked down. Who ya gonna kiss now know ya gonna miss how I move to the to the bottom on my kicks now” “And I’m letting it all out, I have nothing to lose” “I kick it how I wanna kick it when I wanna kick, no you can’t tell me not to kick it cause I’m gonna kick” solo (Jennie) “You got me like” “BITCH NANEUN SOLO” (I know it means I’m shining solo and it’s “bichi”) “Use to be your girl now I’m used to being the goat, your sitting on your feelings I’m sitting on my thrown” “imma do it on my own now now that your alone got you looking for a clone now” “Now I’m going slowmo”

Lisa's Rap In DDU-DU-DDU-Du Verse 2: [Lisa]When we want, we’ll steal outrightWhatever you do, it’s like cutting water with a knifeOur hands are full of a fat checkIf you’re curious, fact checkMy expectations are higherIt’s like fish in waterI’m a little ToxicYou’ve fallen for me, I`m Foxy ??? That is all I can come up with, but I know there are PLENTY more. :)
